message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $110.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! I'm willing to come down a bit, but $90 is a little too low for me.  How about $100? This would still be a great deal for you considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $100 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $95?
